subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: What makes this French Open final all the more intriguing is that Roger Federer, the world's dominant player, is trying to make history against Rafael Nadal, who has dominated their rivalry.
snippet: What makes this French Open final all the more intriguing is that Roger Federer, the world's dominant player, is trying to make history against Rafael Nadal, who has dominated their rivalry.
